name: part_002
file: tmp_【 #博衣こより2周年ライブ 】想い出をライブで届けるMemories & Future!! ＜ゲスト多数！感謝✨＞【3D LIVE】 [wg4-Un6zTiU]_gemini-3-flash-preview/reencoded/part_002.mov

scenes.description: Performance of the song 'Sign wa B'.
Short animated transitional sequence with character introductions.
Performance of the song 'Chu, Tayousei.' in a bar-themed setting.

subtitles.original: サインはB！
subtitles.english: The Sign is B!

subtitles.original: ちゃんと見えてる　君のサイリウム
subtitles.english: I can see them clearly, your glow sticks

subtitles.original: 今ふっと吹けば飛ぶような
subtitles.english: Like something that would blow away with a puff...

subtitles.original: 小さな小さなサインだけど
subtitles.english: ...it's a tiny, tiny sign, but

subtitles.original: 私を推してくれるのなら
subtitles.english: If you're going to support me

subtitles.original: 最大級のレスをあげる
subtitles.english: I'll give you the biggest response

subtitles.original: あなたのアイドル　サインはB
subtitles.english: Your idol, the sign is B

subtitles.original: チュッ！
subtitles.english: Chu!

subtitles.original: うりゃおい！うりゃおい！うりゃおい！うりゃおい！
subtitles.english: Urya-oi! Urya-oi! Urya-oi! Urya-oi!

subtitles.original: B小町！ フー！
subtitles.english: B-Komachi! Hoo!

subtitles.original: 待たせたな　そりゃ当然　自己紹介
subtitles.english: Sorry to keep you waiting, of course, it's introduction time

subtitles.original: 自慢してほしいよ　推しちゃいな
subtitles.english: I want you to be proud, so go ahead and support me

subtitles.original: 誰でもない　君と君と　今を楽しむわけよ
subtitles.english: It's no one else but you and you, I'm here to enjoy the moment with

subtitles.original: 引きこもりも　人見知りも
subtitles.english: The shut-ins, the shy ones too

subtitles.original: 普段と違う顔見せてよ
subtitles.english: Show me a side of you that's different from usual

subtitles.original: みんな今日体調はどうだい？
subtitles.english: How's everyone feeling today?

subtitles.original: なりふり構わずに　サン・サン・サン！
subtitles.english: Without a care for how you look, Sun, Sun, Sun!

subtitles.original: 独り笑われていても関係ない
subtitles.english: It doesn't matter if you're laughed at for being alone

subtitles.original: 周りがどうとかこうとか気にしない
subtitles.english: Don't care about what's going on around you

subtitles.original: ちゃんと見えてる　君のサイリウム
subtitles.english: I can see them clearly, your glow sticks

subtitles.original: たとえ世界が私を拒んで
subtitles.english: Even if the world rejects me

subtitles.original: 独りぼっちを感じたとしても
subtitles.english: And even if I feel all alone

subtitles.original: あなたが味方でいてくれたら
subtitles.english: If you're by my side as an ally

subtitles.original: 怖いものはないよ
subtitles.english: I have nothing to fear

subtitles.original: 見てよ　見てよ　何か始まる
subtitles.english: Look, look, something's about to start

subtitles.original: 君との物語が
subtitles.english: The story with you

subtitles.original: なんて素晴らしい景色だ
subtitles.english: What a wonderful view

subtitles.original: 昨日がいいか今がいいか関係ない
subtitles.english: It doesn't matter if yesterday was better or today is

subtitles.original: 箱が大きい小さいとか気にしない
subtitles.english: I don't care if the venue is big or small

subtitles.original: ちゃんと見えてる　君のサイリウム
subtitles.english: I can see them clearly, your glow sticks

subtitles.original: 今ふっと吹けば飛ぶような
subtitles.english: Like something that would blow away with a puff...

subtitles.original: 小さな小さなサインだけど
subtitles.english: ...it's a tiny, tiny sign, but

subtitles.original: 私を推してくれるのなら
subtitles.english: If you're going to support me

subtitles.original: あなたが味方でいてくれたら
subtitles.english: If you're by my side as an ally

subtitles.original: 最大級のレスをあげる
subtitles.english: I'll give you the biggest response

subtitles.original: あなたのアイドル　サインはB
subtitles.english: Your idol, the sign is B

subtitles.original: チュッ！
subtitles.english: Chu!

subtitles.original: うりゃおい！うりゃおい！うりゃおい！うりゃおい！　B小町！　フー！
subtitles.english: Urya-oi! Urya-oi! Urya-oi! Urya-oi! B-Komachi! Hoo!

subtitles.original: あまりにキュートでセンシティブ
subtitles.english: So cute and sensitive

subtitles.original: やべー
subtitles.english: Whoa...

subtitles.original: 爆発で隠さなきゃ
subtitles.english: Gotta hide it with an explosion

subtitles.original: ぽよっとな
subtitles.english: Poyotto-na

subtitles.original: なんでもWAO!! 爆解!! こよりチャン
subtitles.english: Nandemo WAO!! Bakuretsu!! Koyori-chan

subtitles.original: 我愛你　酔いが覚めない
subtitles.english: Wǒ ài nǐ, the intoxication doesn't fade

subtitles.original: Oh, I need you　恋が醒めない
subtitles.english: Oh, I need you, my love won't awaken

subtitles.original: お生憎様の慣れ果てさ　察して
subtitles.english: The sorry end of a pitiful state, please understand

subtitles.original: 無問題　破滅してみて
subtitles.english: Méi wèntí, try ruining yourself

subtitles.original: Hold me tight　トラウマの味
subtitles.english: Hold me tight, the taste of trauma

subtitles.original: 猛反対　お手お座りでハイ報酬
subtitles.english: Strongly opposed, hand, sit, and here's your reward

subtitles.original: 喉の奥がチクンチクン
subtitles.english: A sting in the back of my throat

subtitles.original: 僕はドクンドクン
subtitles.english: My heart goes thump-thump

subtitles.original: 鼓動で孤独消してみてよ
subtitles.english: Try to erase the loneliness with your heartbeat

subtitles.original: 愛も恋も独占して
subtitles.english: Monopolize both love and affection

subtitles.original: 僕を独占して
subtitles.english: Monopolize me

subtitles.original: このまま中毒になるまで
subtitles.english: Until we're addicted like this...

subtitles.original: チューしよ
subtitles.english: ...let's kiss

subtitles.original: そして Get get get on! Get get get on!
subtitles.english: And then, Get get get on! Get get get on!

subtitles.original: Get get get on chu!
subtitles.english: Get get get on chu!

subtitles.original: 熱く溶けるくらいに溢れた気持ちが
subtitles.english: These feelings overflowing until they hotly melt

subtitles.original: たまらないでしょ
subtitles.english: You can't resist them, right?

subtitles.original: Get get get on! Get get get on!
subtitles.english: Get get get on! Get get get on!

subtitles.original: Get get get on chu!
subtitles.english: Get get get on chu!

subtitles.original: 我愛你　無問題
subtitles.english: Wǒ ài nǐ, méi wèntí

subtitles.original: Get get get on chu!
subtitles.english: Get get get on chu!

subtitles.original: ポンチーカン　勝負はいつも
subtitles.english: Pon, Chi, Kan, the match is always...

subtitles.original: トンチンカン　僕に言わせりゃ
subtitles.english: ...absurd, if you ask me

subtitles.original: ちんぷんかんぷんだ　最後はロンでしょ？
subtitles.english: It's all gibberish, the end is 'Ron', right?

subtitles.original: もう何回？
subtitles.english: How many times?

subtitles.original: 殺されればいい
subtitles.english: How many times must I be killed?

subtitles.original: Oh, One night　忘れられない
subtitles.english: Oh, One night, I can't forget

subtitles.original: 終わんない　トキメキ偏愛予報
subtitles.english: It never ends, the heartbeat-fluttering bias forecast

subtitles.original: 喉の奥がチクンチクン
subtitles.english: A sting in the back of my throat

subtitles.original: 僕はドクンドクン
subtitles.english: My heart goes thump-thump

subtitles.original: 心臓ごと引きずり出してみてよ
subtitles.english: Try dragging it out, heart and all
